entry.value: This kit demonstrates how to create a AAA quality, high-performance optimized game/first-person shooter (FPS) UI using the Scaleform GFx Direct Access API with ActionScript 2 content.
This kit demonstrates how to create a AAA quality, high-performance optimized game/first-person shooter (FPS) UI using the Scaleform GFx Direct Access API with ActionScript 3 content.
